metadata.title: CVE-2017-15576 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Redmine before 3.2.6 and 3.3.x before 3.3.3 mishandles Time Entry renderingin activity views, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
